name: Jazz V. The World 2023
description:
A Jazz musician decides that jazz is better than all other music and will fight to the end to prove himself right. He goes up against popular music genres, such as Lofi, Metal, and Techno, proving that jazz can take on any genre of music.

Developers:
JJ C
Ellen E
Alex W
Mihika P
Nick O
Zak B
Riley M
Micah M

Controls:
WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
E to Equip
Left Click to Shoot
move Mouse to Aim
Esc to pause
